title: [1] Can't Be Trusted
contents: [Excerpt from a scavenger captain's written orders]
...And we just got new orders from Brak.
If we get any message from a "NARS" promising to help us "evacuate", IGNORE it!
Brak says that those guys can't be trusted no matter what.
They've set up a base pretty close by, and they're rallying a lot of suckers there.
Brak said if we see anyone making a break for their base, shoot 'em.
That INCLUDES any of our guys, too.
We need every hand we can get to fight off those zombies, and now Brak wants us to attack that base within the hour.
And you new guys better follow along nice and well this time!
Brak's the man with the plan right now.
If anyone can get us out of this mess, it's him.
So get moving! No more dawdling!
